text: @UAMS_Health: Congratulations to our nine physicians named Healthcare Research All-Stars! 🌟💡 Their dedication to innovative research and top-notch patient care is truly inspiring. 🙌 #UAMSproud #HealthcareResearch #AllStars👍🏼💬 comments:* "Fantastic! Well-deserved recognition for the hard work and dedication of our UAMS physicians!" 👏🏼💕* "Proud to see UAMS leading the way in healthcare research and excellence!" 💪🏼🔥* "Inspiring to see such talented and committed professionals pushing the boundaries of medicine. Keep up the amazing work, UAMS team!" 🌈💥
